schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

comments.base_folder: Root folder containing effect subfolders. Each effect folder should have 'Source', 'Generated_Video', and 'Metadata' subfolders.
comments.output_group_tasks_by: Set to 0 (or omit) to create individual reports per task. Set to N (e.g., 5) to group N tasks (effects) into one combined report. Example: with 5 effects and group_tasks_by=5, creates 1 report; with 10 effects, creates 2 reports.
comments.tasks: Each task represents a Vidu effect with category and effect name. The effect name must match the subfolder name in base_folder.
